analysis.description:
TwelveHourTrains.withdraw (/unique_chucks/10/0xdf719da6ee495547b43737fc5ba56d139a16da5b.sol#153-169) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(joined[msg.sender] > 0) (/unique_chucks/10/0xdf719da6ee495547b43737fc5ba56d139a16da5b.sol#154-155)
